column6: The kid gloves are off! With one Lizard down and one to go, and Man-Wolf and Vermin still on the loose, Spider-Man dons his new costume to even the odds.  But what role does...Madame Web play? And what's going on between the Black Cat and the Puma?
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | penciller (cover):Clayton Crain | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:Dan Kemp | letterer:Cory Petit
